About the Company: Denis Chem Lab Ltd is a Public Limited Pharmaceutical Company incorporated in 1982. It is a part of Sintex Industries Limited, one of Indias top 500 companies having wide interests in Plastics, Textiles & Pharmaceuticals. The products of the Company are manufactured in ultra modern plant using automatic equipments and facilities, which are conforming to GMP specifications as per WHO norms. The company has recently started manufacturing of I.V. Fluids in P.P. Plastic bottles using latest BFS technology with an installed capacity of 15 million units per annum.
